messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: Although I want your vote very much, in this marginal constituency, I ask you to vote for David Drew if possible. He is a committed Euro-sceptic, who will continue to fight for our freedom in Parliament and I don't want to stop him getting there. He has not asked for this help but we believe it would be for the good of our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support people like David Drew who are prepared to fight for it.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defend sites like Fox's Field from EU planning targets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign against EU planning targets affecting local sites.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In this marginal constituency, tactical voting is suggested to support David Drew, a Euro-sceptic, to ensure his position in Parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: Defend our democratic independence from the EU; resist EU planning targets.

housing.content: Defend sites like Fox's Field from EU planning targets.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSLU-HZBG-UBBG, UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG.

images.caption: Campaign communication for the UK Independence Party featuring Steve Parker for Stroud constituency.
